title: BioSource Naturals Calendula (Calendula officinalis) Oil 0.5 Fl Oz / 15 Ml - Beneficial for Skin
features: Biosource Naturals Calendula (Calendula officinalis) Oil. CO2 extracted from flowering tops. Originates from South Africa.

Biosource Naturals Calendula oil is mainly used for skin conditioning and improvements. It has been traditionally used to help speed wound healing and aids with scar reduction. It can be used in salves for burns, bruises and cuts.

Biosource Naturals Calendula oil blends well with lavender and is a skin soothing preparation. Additionally, this calendula oil blends well with lemon, lime, rose, neroli and all floral oils, oakmoss, cinnamon, and jasmine. To use this oil, add it to a carrier oil before gently massaging into skin.

Get 50% more with our 15 ml bottle than the 10 ml bottle of other brands. Packaged in a 0.5 fl oz (15 ml) or 1.0 oz (30 ml) concentrate bottle which can be diluted with carrier oil for direct skin contact, such as Sweet Almond Oil. Amber glass bottle, Euro plug. Safety shrink wrapped. Satisfaction Guaranteed.
Biosource Naturals is founded by a naturopath, aromatherapist, EFT practitioner, Reiki Master. We supply Therapeutic Quality Pure Essential Oils verified by GC and/or other QC testing.
description: Biosource Naturals Calendula (Calendula officinalis) Oil. CO2 extracted from flowering tops. Originates from South Africa.
Biosource Naturals Calendula (Calendula officinalis) Oil. CO2 extracted from flowering tops. Originates from South Africa.

Calendula is known as a skin calming oil and has synergies when combined with lavender. Combining lavender and calendula can be beneficial in massage, diaper rash, sore feet, and ringworm. Its calming properties make it suitable for help with acne, wounds, bedsores, varicose veins, eczema, and skin rashes.
